TopicTitle: Game crashing a bit too much

Articles.Content: I  need help on something, i have downloaded some mods for space stations and bases, but from just downloading them when on my main save with 58 ships currently in orbit around something or escape trajectory, whenever i decide to go back to the space center or recover a vessel my game crashed, every time, i need help!

Pretty hard to guess without any logs or relevant information. But the usual problem in threads like this is people not using the 64 bit executable and using way too many mods for the 32 bit one to handle.
